casebody.data:
Smith v. Lennon et al. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. April 17, 1891.) Appeal from special term, New York county. , Action by John B. Smith, assignee, against William F. Lennon and another, to foreclose a mortgage. There was a judgment for the plaintiff, and the defendants appeal.

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J., and Daniels and Lawrence, JJ.

James Kearney, (Geo. W. Miller, of counsel,) for appellants. A. C. Fransioli, for respondent. Van Brunt, P. J.

The decision in the case of Smith v. Lennon, ante, 259, (action No. 1,) disposes of this case,, and upon the opinion therein rendered this judgment should be affirmed, with costs. All concúr.
